    Characters family

    NoGoingBackLevel 2
    AntiTraits Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis, Equestrian_Tribunus_Augusticlavis, Equestrian_Praefectus_Alae, Equestrian_Praefectus_Legionis, Equestrian_Praefectus_Praetorio, Procurator_Sexegenarius, Procurator_Centenarius, Procurator_Ducenarius, Tribunus, Legatus, Legatus_Legionis, Imperator

        EffectsDescription Equestrian_Praefectus_Cohortis_effects_desc
        Threshold  1
        
        Effect InfantryCommand 1
        
;This would be a position for a junior Tribunus of Equestrian rank...so only for
;an Equestrian by birth who was quite young. He has little authority
;He should proceed, somehow, to the next level 'Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis'
;where he has more authority. I'm guessing that some Equestrians 'skipped' to this
;level thru appointment or influence of the father or family. Could be used solely
;for a 'ComesOfAge' equestrian. Some sources said he was just an administrator     
;------------------------------------------
Trait Equestrian_Tribunus_Augusticlavis
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures barbarian, greek, eastern, egyptian, carthaginian, nomad
    NoGoingBackLevel 2
    AntiTraits Equestrian_Praefectus_Alae, Equestrian_Praefectus_Legionis, Equestrian_Praefectus_Praetorio, Procurator_Sexegenarius, Procurator_Centenarius, Procurator_Ducenarius, Tribunus, Legatus, Legatus_Legionis, Imperator

    Level Equestrian_Tribunus_Augusticlavis
        Description Equestrian_Tribunus_Augusticlavis_desc
        EffectsDescription Equestrian_Tribunus_Augusticlavis_effects_desc
        Threshold  1
        
        Effect InfantryCommand -1
        Effect Influence -1

;This character would be a more senior or acknowledged individual put in charge of one
;of the ten cohorts in a Legion. He would be following the tree and rising thru experience
;------------------------------------------
Trait Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures barbarian, greek, eastern, egyptian, carthaginian, nomad
    NoGoingBackLevel 2
    AntiTraits Equestrian_Praefectus_Alae, Equestrian_Praefectus_Legionis, Equestrian_Praefectus_Praetorio, Procurator_Sexegenarius, Procurator_Centenarius, Procurator_Ducenarius, Tribunus, Legatus, Legatus_Legionis, Imperator

    Level Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis
        Description Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis_desc
        EffectsDescription Equestrian_Tribunus_Cohortis_effects_desc
        Threshold  1
        
         Effect InfantryCommand 1

;The two traits above proceed to the next three, whichever of them the character has
;------------------------------------------

    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures barbarian, greek, eastern, egyptian, carthaginian, nomad
    NoGoingBackLevel 2
    AntiTraits Equestrian_Praefectus_Legionis, Equestrian_Praefectus_Praetorio, Procurator_Sexegenarius, Procurator_Centenarius, Procurator_Ducenarius, Tribunus, Legatus, Legatus_Legionis, Imperator

        Effect CavalryCommand 1

;remember to exclude Celts from Trait GoodBesieger, they get this instead
;and not trait BadBesieger
;------------------------------------------Siege Man
Trait Sedlonuios
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures roman, nomad, greek, eastern, egyptian, carthaginian
    NoGoingBackLevel 4
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;    AntiTraits GoodBesieger, BadBesieger

        Description Sedlonuios1_desc
        EffectsDescription Sedlonuios1_effects_desc
        Threshold  1 

        Effect SiegeAttack  1

    Level Sedlonuios2
        Description Sedlonuios2_desc
        EffectsDescription Sedlonuios2_effects_desc
        Threshold  2 

        Effect SiegeAttack  2

    Level Sedlonuios3
        Description Sedlonuios3_desc
        EffectsDescription Sedlonuios3_effects_desc
        Threshold  4

    ExcludeCultures nomad, barbarian, roman, eastern, carthaginian, egyptian
    AntiTraits Strategos_Autokrator, GreekleaderSeleucid, Exheir

    EffectsDescription Archistrategos_effects_desc
    GainMessage Archistrategos_gain_desc
    Threshold 1
    Effect Command 2
    Effect TroopMorale 1
    Effect Influence 2
    Effect Management 1
        
;Strategos Autokrator (Strategos with near limitless authority, hand appointed by the ;Baslieus)-> Archistrategos (The supreme ruler of all army in the Kingdom, second only ;to the Basileus)
;
;------------------------------------------ 
;Related Traits to 'Greek_Military_Career_Infantry', lost at next level:
;LVL1: (Rare) Katadromeus-expert on night raids and other missions

        Description Spartiates_desc
        EffectsDescription Spartiates_effects_desc
        Epithet Spartiates_epithet_desc
        Threshold 1
        
        Effect Influence 2
        Effect Command 1

;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trait Optimates
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures eastern, carthaginian, egyptian, greek, barbarian
    AntiTraits Populares

    Level Optimates
        Description Optimates_desc
        EffectsDescription Optimates_effects_desc
    Threshold  1 

        Effect Command  1 
        Effect Management  1

        EffectsDescription No_Effect_effects_desc
        Threshold 1
        
        Effect Management 1
    
    Level No_Level
        Description No_Description_desc
        EffectsDescription No_Effect_effects_desc
        Threshold  8
        
        Effect Management 1
        Effect Influence 1

    Level No_Level
        Description No_Description_desc
        EffectsDescription No_Effect_effects_desc
        Threshold  16
        
        Effect Management 1
        Effect Influence 1

;===============================================================
;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral_speed_increase
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
    Condition AgentType = admiral
        and not Trait FasterAdmirals = 1
 
    Affects FasterAdmirals 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingVictory_lower_bad_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker > 0

    Affects BadAttacker  Lose  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker

          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crushing_victory_for_sub4_general_4BIpatch
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and BattleOdds < 2.1
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2
          and Attribute Command < 4

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger clear_victory_for_sub4_general_4BIpatch
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and BattleOdds < 1.9
          and Attribute Command < 4
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crushing_other_victory_4BIpatch
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not I_ConflictType Normal

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  100

Trigger Stone_wall_siege_attack_success
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  15 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle

          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Energetic  1  Chance  15

    Affects GamesFanRomanVice  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ApicianRomanVice  1  Chance  4 
    Affects AuthoritarianRomanVirtue  1  Chance  2
    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  4
    ;Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  5

Trigger random_birth_Barbarian_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= ludus_magnus
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType galatians

    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence1  1  Chance  7 
    Affects EducatedBarbarian  1  Chance  5

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement

          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects Personality_Stoic  1  Chance  1

          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman

    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  30 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1b
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and Trait Berserker >= 1

    Affects Berserker  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command > 1

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  10 
    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and not CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command < 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.5

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20 
    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command < 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.4

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  33 
    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command > 1

    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0
          and BattleOdds <= 1.2

    Affects Coward  1  Chance  10

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait GoodCommander >= 2

          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2
          and Trait VictorOthersVirtue >= 1

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  10 
    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RandomPercent > 50
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  1 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  10

; STB 09-Jul-2020 Add new triggers
;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 1
          and IsNightBattle
          and Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and WonBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

; YHZ 02-Mar-2020 - Allow adding night traits to descr_strat.txt, and remove them outside of Remastered
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_not_remastered
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 1
          and not NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  -1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66


;===============================================================
;== Section A1 - AI Trait Triggers                             ==
;===============================================================
Trigger MOHAdopted_Initiator
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not CultureType eastern
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Greek_Non_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Mixed_Heritage = 0
        and Trait Perioikoi = 0
        and Trait Spartiates = 0
        and Trait Is_Arverni = 0
        and Trait Not_Arverni = 0
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 0      

    Affects MoHAdopted  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------    
Trigger MOHAdopted_Initiator_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType eastern
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Greek_Non_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Mixed_Heritage = 0
        and Trait Perioikoi = 0
        and Trait Spartiates = 0
        and Trait Is_Arverni = 0
        and Trait Not_Arverni = 0
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 0       

    Affects MoHAdopted  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger City_Governed_Trigger1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_villa
          and not Trait City_Has_Governor > 0

    Affects City_Has_Governor  1  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger City_Governed_Trigger2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0

    Affects Not_A_Governor  2  Chance  100 
    
;;;;;;AI
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CharacterIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= governors_villa
          and Trait City_Has_Governor = 0

    Affects City_Has_Governor  6  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CharacterIsLocal
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0

    Affects Not_A_Governor  2  Chance  100

;== Section B  -  BATTLE TRAIT Triggers                    ==

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Close_Victory_Battle_Counter1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = close

    Affects Battle_Counter  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Close_Victory_Battle_Counter3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = close

    Affects Battle_Counter  4  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Average_Victory_Battle_Counter1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = average

    Affects Battle_Counter  3  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Average_Victory_Battle_Counter3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = average

    Affects Battle_Counter  6  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Clear_Victory_Battle_Counter1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = clear

    Affects Battle_Counter  4  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Clear_Victory_Battle_Counter3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = clear

    Affects Battle_Counter  8  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Crushing_Victory_Battle_Counter1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = crushing

    Affects Battle_Counter  6  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Crushing_Victory_Battle_Counter3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and not CultureType nomad
          and not FactionType parthia
          and BattleSuccess = crushing

    Affects Battle_Counter  12  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Standard_Battle_Any_Defeat_Battle_Counter
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle

    Affects Anti_Battle_Counter  10  Chance  100

;;;    Affects Bad_Weapons_Builder  1  Chance  5

;===============================================================
;== Section D - Wife\Marriage Trait Triggers                  ==
;===============================================================
Trigger just_got_married
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried = 0

    Affects JustMarried  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marriedHealhtyWife
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 0

    Affects HealthyWife 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marriedHealhtyWife2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait HaleAndHearty > 0
          and FatherTrait HealthyWife = 0

    Affects HealthyWife 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marriedHealhtyWife3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait HaleAndHearty > 0
          and FatherTrait HealthyWife = 1

    Affects HealthyWife 1 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marriedHealhtyWife4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait HaleAndHearty = 0
          and FatherTrait HealthyWife = 1

    Affects HealthyWife 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marriedHealhtyWife5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait HaleAndHearty = 0
          and FatherTrait Hypochondriac = 0
          and FatherTrait HealthyWife = 0
          and FatherTrait SicklyWife = 0

    Affects HealthyWife 1 Chance 10

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 0

          and Trait JustMarried = 1

    Affects BeenMarried  2  Chance  100

    Condition AgentType = family
          and IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried < 1

    Affects BeenMarried  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 0

    Affects FaithfulWife  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Cuckold  2  Chance  4 
    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  5 
    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait FaithfulWife = 1

    Affects FaithfulWife  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait WellConnectedWife >= 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 0

    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  50
    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait WellConnectedWife2 >= 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 0

    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  50
    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait Cuckold >= 1

    Affects Cuckold  2  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait InLaw = 1
          and FatherTrait WellConnectedWife = 0
          and FatherTrait FaithfulWife = 0
          and FatherTrait Cuckold = 0
          and FatherTrait WellConnectedWife2 = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 0
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 0

    Affects FaithfulWife  1  Chance  8
    Affects Cuckold  2  Chance  4
    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  5
    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 1

    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_08
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 1

    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_09
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife = 2

    Affects WellConnectedWife  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_10
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1
          and Trait WellConnectedWife2 = 2

    Affects WellConnectedWife2  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Family_11
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait JustMarried = 1

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  4
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_HealthyWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait HealthyWife > 0

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_SicklyWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait SicklyWife > 0

    Affects Hypochondriac  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  3 
;;;    Affects Haemophiliac  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_IntelligentWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait IntelligentWife > 0

    Affects Personality_Intelligent  1  Chance  10 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_IgnorantWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait IgnorantWife > 0

    Affects Personality_Slow  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_BeautifulWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeautifulWife > 0
          and FatherTrait Ugly = 0

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  7 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_PlainWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait PlainWife > 0
          and not FatherTrait Handsome > 0

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  1
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mother_WellConnectedWife
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait WellConnectedWife > 0

    Affects PoliticsSkill  5  Chance  7 
    
;===============================================================
;== Section E - Age Trait Triggers                             ==
;===============================================================
;- Note: Age is by seasons with the assumption that everyone starts at 16 years old,
;        so CharacterAge > 68 is really 16 + 68/2 = 50 years
Trigger everyone_ages_one_turn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not AgentType = admiral
    
    Affects CharacterAges  1  Chance  100
    Affects TurnsAlive2  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomat_middle_age
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait DiplomatTurnsAlive = 1
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2

    Affects DiplomatTurnsAlive  1  Chance  80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomat_senior_citizen
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait DiplomatTurnsAlive = 2
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 3

    Affects DiplomatTurnsAlive  1  Chance  90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomat_elderly
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait DiplomatTurnsAlive = 3
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 4

    Affects DiplomatTurnsAlive  1  Chance  95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spy_middle_age
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 1
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spy_senior_citizen
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 2
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 3

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spy_elderly
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 3
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 4

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassin_middle_age
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 1
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassin_senior_citizen
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 2
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 3

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassin_elderly
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and Trait AgentTurnsAlive = 3
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 4

    Affects AgentTurnsAlive  1  Chance  95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_middle_age
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
         and Trait TurnsAlive = 1
         and Trait CharacterAges >= 2

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_senior_citizen
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
         and Trait TurnsAlive = 2
         and Trait CharacterAges >= 3

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_elderly
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = family
         and Trait TurnsAlive = 3
         and Trait CharacterAges >= 4

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  95

;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_starting_age
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  100
    Affects CharacterAges  32  Chance  100 
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_marriage_age
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  100
    Affects CharacterAges  45  Chance  100 
    Affects InLaw 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger general_adoption_age
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  100
    Affects CharacterAges  45  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger lesser_general_adoption_age
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Affects TurnsAlive  1  Chance  100
    Affects CharacterAges  45  Chance  100

;===============================================================
;== Section F - Genetic Trait Triggers                        ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger loving_Father
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Uncaring_Father = 0
          and Trait Loving_Father = 0
    
    Affects Loving_Father  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uncaring_Father
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Uncaring_Father = 0
          and Trait Loving_Father = 0
    
    Affects Uncaring_Father  1  Chance  20
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loving_Or_Uncaring_Father1
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Uncaring_Father = 0
          and Trait Loving_Father = 0
    
    Affects Uncaring_Father  1  Chance  15
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loving_Or_Uncaring_Father2
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Uncaring_Father = 0
          and Trait Loving_Father = 0
    
    Affects Loving_Father  1  Chance  20
    
;------------Comes Of Age Triggers---------------
Trigger Genetic_like_dad_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait TakesAfterDad = 0
          and Trait NotLikeDad = 0

    Affects TakesAfterDad  1  Chance  40
    
;------------Comes Of Age Triggers---------------
Trigger Genetic_NotLikeDad_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait TakesAfterDad = 0
          and Trait NotLikeDad = 0

    Affects NotLikeDad  1  Chance  30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_02
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  30 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_Fertile_01
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_Fertile_02
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_Fertile_03
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_Fertile_04
    WhenToTest BrotherAdopted 

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  30 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_03
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_05
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Inbred > 0

    Affects Inbred  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_06
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  2
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_07
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Ugly >= 1
          and Trait TakesAfterDad > 0

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_08
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_09
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Handsome >= 1
          and Trait TakesAfterDad > 0

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  50 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_random_birth_10
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects SmoothTalker  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------    
;-------Progression Triggers---------------
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Infertile_On_The_Road_Stage1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition IsGeneral
        and InEnemyLands

    Affects Infertile_On_The_Road  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Fertile_Home_Again_Stage1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition IsGeneral
        and not InEnemyLands
        and Trait Infertile_On_The_Road > 0

    Affects Fertile_Home_Again  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition Trait Fertile >= 1

    Affects Fertile  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition Trait Infertile >= 1

    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  2
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait May_Get_This = 1
          and Trait Inbred > 0

    Affects Inbred  1  Chance  4
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition Trait Ugly > 0

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition Trait Handsome > 0

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  3    

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_08
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FatherTrait Handsome >= 1
          and Trait TakesAfterDad > 0

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  50 
    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  8
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Stages_09
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition Trait SmoothTalker > 0

    Affects SmoothTalker  1  Chance  5   
    
;------------------------------------------    
;-------Genetics Adoption Triggers---------
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_02
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    
    Condition not Trait Fertile > 0
    
    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  2
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_02a
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption
    
    Condition not Trait Fertile > 0
    
    Affects Infertile  1  Chance  2
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_03
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait May_Get_This = 1

    Affects Inbred  1  Chance  1
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_04
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FatherTrait Inbred >= 2

    Affects Inbred  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_05
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_06
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FatherTrait Ugly > 0
          and Trait TakesAfterDad > 0

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_07
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  5    

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_Adoption_08
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FatherTrait Handsome > 0
          and Trait TakesAfterDad > 0

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  50 
    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  8
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_LesserGeneral_Adoption_03
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Affects Inbred  1  Chance  1
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_LesserGeneral_Adoption_04
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Affects Ugly  1  Chance  2 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Genetic_LesserGeneral_Adoption_05
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  10    
    
;------------------------------------------    
;-------Genetics Personality Triggers---------
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Pessimist > 0
          and not Trait Superstitious > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Optimist  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Optimist > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Confident > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Stoic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Passionate > 0
          and not Trait PublicFaith > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Pessimist  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Dishonest > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Disloyal > 0
          and not Trait Embezzler > 0
          and not Trait HarshRuler > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Honest  1  Chance  10 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Honest > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Loyal > 0
          and not Trait KindRuler > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0
          and not Trait GoodAdministrator > 0
          and RandomPercent = 25
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Dishonest  1  Chance  2 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Confident > 0
          and not Trait Personality_HotHeaded > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Conceited > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Harsh > 0
          and not Trait Talkative > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Shy  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Shy > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Pessimist > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Confident  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Inbred > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Intelligent  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_08
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not Trait Personality_Intelligent > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Confident > 0
          and not Trait InspiringSpeaker > 0
          and not Trait PoliticsSkill > 0
          and not Trait LogisticalSkill > 0
          and RandomPercent = 25
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Slow  1  Chance  1 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_09
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Harsh > 0
          and not Trait Personality_HotHeaded > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Conceited > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Dishonest > 0
          and not Trait Embezzler > 0
          and not Trait HarshRuler > 0
          and not Trait Miserly > 0
          and not Trait Cheapskate > 0
          and not Trait Perverted > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait HarshJustice > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Considerate  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_09a
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Harsh > 0
          and not Trait Personality_HotHeaded > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Conceited > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Dishonest > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Disloyal > 0
          and not Trait Embezzler > 0
          and not Trait HarshRuler > 0
          and not Trait Miserly > 0
          and not Trait Cheapskate > 0
          and not Trait Perverted > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait HarshJustice > 0
          and Trait Loving_Father = 1
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Considerate  1  Chance  10
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_10
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Shy > 0
          and not Trait KindRuler > 0
          and RandomPercent = 25
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Harsh  1  Chance  3
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_10a
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Shy > 0
          and not Trait KindRuler > 0
          and Trait Uncaring_Father = 1
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Harsh  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_10b
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Personality_Harsh > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Harsh  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_11
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and not Trait Perverted > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_HardWorking  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_12
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Confident > 0
          and not Trait Personality_HardWorking > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Passionate > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Hasty > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Optimist > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Procrastinator  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_13
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Stoic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Pessimist > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Passionate  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Shy > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Stoic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_HotHeaded  1  Chance  5

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_HotHeaded > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Hasty > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Stoic  1  Chance  5

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Stoic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Procrastinator > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Hasty  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_17
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Disloyal > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Dishonest > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Loyal  1  Chance  5

    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType romans_julii

    Affects Personality_Loyal  32  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and IsFactionLeader
        and Trait Personality_Disloyal > 0

    Affects Personality_Loyal  32  Chance  100

          and GeneralFoughtFaction carthage

          and IsGeneral
          and FactionLeaderTrait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 0

Trigger Personality_Trigger_18
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Loyal > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Honest > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and RandomPercent = 50
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader

    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  1
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_19
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Personality_Conceited > 0
          and RandomPercent = 50
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not Trait Personality_Loyal > 0

    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  4
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_19a
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Personality_Disloyal > 0
        and IsGeneral
        and not Trait Personality_Loyal > 0
        and not IsFactionLeader

    Affects Personality_Disloyal  1  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Personality_Trigger_20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Superstitious > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait ReligiousMania > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Hasty > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Optimist > 0
          and not Trait Pious > 0
          and not Trait PublicFaith > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Pragmatic  1  Chance  5 
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition not Trait Personality_Shy > 0
          and not Trait Personality_Considerate > 0
          and not Trait Pious > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0
          and IsGeneral

    Affects Personality_Conceited  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderRoman
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and Trait Imperator < 0

    Affects Romanleader  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderRoman2
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and Trait Imperator > 0

    Affects Romanleader2  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderPergamon
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType pergamon

    Affects GreekleaderPergamon  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderBosporan
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType bosporan

    Affects GreekleaderBosporan  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderSeleucid
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType seleucid

    Affects GreekleaderSeleucid  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderPontus
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType pontus

    Affects GreekleaderPontus  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderMacedon
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType macedon

    Affects GreekleaderMacedon  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger faction_leaders_Armenia_01
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType armenia

    Affects Armenianleader  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger faction_leaders_Armenia_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType armenia
        and Trait Armenianleader = 0
        and IsFactionLeader

    Affects Armenianleader  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger faction_leaders_Armenia_03
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType armenia

    Affects ArmenianHeir  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger faction_leaders_Armenia_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType armenia
        and Trait ArmenianHeir = 0
        and IsFactionHeir

    Affects ArmenianHeir  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger faction_leaders_Armenia_05
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType armenia
          and Trait ArmenianHeir = 1

    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleaderParthia
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType parthia

    Affects Parthianleader  1  Chance  100

;== Section K1 - Armenian Noble House Triggers                 ==

Trigger Yervanduni_House_OfAge
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait YervanduniHouse = 1
    Affects YervanduniHouse  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Yervanduni_House_Adopted
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MoHAdopted = 1
          and FatherTrait YervanduniHouse = 1
    Affects YervanduniHouse  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mamikonian_House_OfAge
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait MamikonianHouse = 1

    Affects MamikonianHouse  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MoHAdopted = 1
          and FatherTrait MamikonianHouse = 1

    Affects MamikonianHouse  1  Chance  100

          and Trait MamikonianHouseFounded = 0

          and FactionLeaderTrait ArtashesianHouseFounded = 1

Trigger Armenian_Government_Initiator_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and Trait Armenian_Government = 0
          and Attribute Influence >= 3

    Affects Armenian_Government  2  Chance  25
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Government_Initiator_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and Trait Armenian_Government = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1  
          and Attribute Influence >= 3

    Affects Armenian_Government  2  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Government_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+1
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Attribute Influence >= 4
          and Trait Armenian_Government = 1

    Affects Armenian_Government  1  Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Government_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Attribute Influence >= 5
          and Trait Armenian_Government = 2

    Affects Armenian_Government  2  Chance  12
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Government_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType armenia
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= baths
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= paved_roads
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Attribute Influence >= 6
          and Trait Armenian_Government = 3

    Affects Armenian_Government  2  Chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Arkayits_Arkah_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType armenia
          and I_SettlementOwner Antiocheia = armenia

    Affects Armenian_Arkayits_Arkah  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Gahnamak_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType armenia
          and Trait Gahnamak = 0

    Affects Gahnamak  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Zoranamak_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType armenia
          and Trait Zoranamak = 0

    Affects Zoranamak  1  Chance  100

Trigger dads_Aspahapet
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType parthia
          and FatherTrait Aspahapet > 0

    Affects Aspahapet  1  Chance  100
    Affects ParthianNobleHouse  1  Chance  100

          and Trait BeingPahlavan > 0

    Affects Aspahapet  1  Chance  13 
    Affects Dahae  1  Chance  13
    Affects Karen  1  Chance  13 
    Affects Mihran  1  Chance  13 
    Affects Parni  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Sohae  1  Chance  13

    Affects ParthianNobleHouse  1  Chance  100

Trigger Parthian_Education_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and FactionIsLocal
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Parthian_Education > 0

    Affects Parthian_Education  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionType parthia
          and not FactionIsLocal
          and Trait Parthian_Education > 0

    Affects Parthian_Education  1  Chance  100


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;== Section R - Roman Leadership Triggers                       ==
;===============================================================
;===============================================================
;== Section R1 - Roman Classes Triggers                         ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 25
    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 25
    Affects Patrician 3 Chance 10
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 33
    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 33
    Affects Patrician 3 Chance 33
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Patrician 3 Chance 45
    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 45
    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 45
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 60
    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 20
    Affects Patrician 3 Chance 20
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 70
    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 25
    Affects Patrician 3 Chance 25
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger class_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Character_Comes_Of_Age_Patrician
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
        and FatherTrait Patrician = 1

    Affects Patrician  3  Chance  100

    Condition CultureType roman
        and FatherTrait Patrician = 1
        and Trait Equestrian = 1

    Affects Patrician  3  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and not FactionType slave
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Plebeian = 0
        and Trait Equestrian = 0
        and Trait Patrician = 0

    Affects Plebeian 1 Chance 75
    Affects Equestrian 2 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_Comes_Of_Age_Senator
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
        and FatherTrait Senator = 1
        and FatherTrait Patrician = 1

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senatorial_Patrician
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Patrician = 1
        and Trait Estates = 3
        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100


;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senatorial_Mercatores
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Mercatores = 3
        and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 1
        and Trait Tribune_Plebs = 0

        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100
    Affects EquoPublicoExornatus 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian 3 Chance 100
    Affects RemovePlebeianCareers 4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senatorial_Negotiatores
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Negotiatores = 3
        and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 1
        and Trait Tribune_Plebs = 0
        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100
    Affects EquoPublicoExornatus 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian 3 Chance 100
    Affects RemovePlebeianCareers 4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senatorial_Jurist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Jurist = 3
        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senatorial_Publicani
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Publicani = 3
        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_Comes_Of_Age_Senatorial
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
        and FatherTrait Senatorial = 1

    Affects Senatorial  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_Marries_Senatorial
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial = 1

    Affects Senatorial  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_Adopted_Senatorial
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial = 1

    Affects Senatorial  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Lesser_General_Adopted_Senatorial
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial = 1

    Affects Senatorial  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Brother_Adopted_Senatorial
    WhenToTest BrotherAdopted

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial = 1

    Affects Senatorial  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Promote_Senator_Tribunus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial > 0
        and Trait Senator = 0
        and Trait Imperator = 0
        and Trait Patrician_Military_Tree > 0
        and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 1
;        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senator  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;

Trigger Promote_Senator_Quaestor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial > 0
        and Trait Senator = 0
        and Trait Imperator = 0
        and Trait Quaestor > 0
;        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senator  2  Chance  100

        and Trait Senatorial > 0
        and Trait Senator = 0
        and Trait Imperator = 0
        and Trait Former_Quaestor > 0
;        and EndedInSettlement

    Affects Senator  2  Chance  100

        and Trait Negotiatores = 0
        and Trait Mercatores = 0

    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  33
    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  50

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Plebeian = 1
        and Trait Negotiatores = 0
        and Trait Mercatores = 0

    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  33
    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  33
    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  50

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Plebeian = 1
        and Trait Negotiatores = 0
        and Trait Mercatores = 0

    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  80
    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  80

        and Trait Plebeian = 1
        and Trait Negotiatores = 0

    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  50

        and Trait Plebeian  = 1
        and Trait Mercatores  = 0

    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  100

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Plebeian = 1
        and Trait Negotiatores = 0

    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  50

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Plebeian  = 1
        and Trait Mercatores  = 0

    Affects Negotiatores  1  Chance  100

    Condition EndedInSettlement
        and SettlementBuildingExists = market
        and Trait Mercatores = 1

    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  20

;        and SettlementBuildingExists = economic_city

        and Trait Mercatores = 2

;        and SettlementBuildingExists = fortified_city
        and SettlementBuildingExists = forum
        and Trait Mercatores = 2

        and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
        and Trait Mercatores = 2

    Affects Mercatores  1  Chance  40

;        and SettlementBuildingExists = economic_city
        and SettlementBuildingExists = academy
        and Trait Negotiatores = 1

        and SettlementBuildingExists >= caravan
;        and SettlementBuildingExists = economic_city
        and SettlementBuildingExists = academy
        and Trait Negotiatores = 2

        and SettlementBuildingExists >= mines
        and Trait Negotiatores = 2

        and Trait Negotiatores = 2

        and Trait Patrician = 1
        and Trait Estates = 0

    Affects Estates  1  Chance  100

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Patrician = 1

    Affects Estates  1  Chance  100

        and Trait Patrician = 1

        and Trait Patrician = 1

        and Trait Patrician = 1

        and Trait Patrician = 1
        and Trait Senatorial = 0

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
        and Trait Senatorial > 0

    Affects Estates  1  Chance  50

        and Trait Senatorial > 0
        and EndedInSettlement

        and EndedInSettlement

;===============================================================
;== Section R5 - Dictator for Life/Emperor Triggers             ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Promote_to_Imperator
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and IsFactionLeader
        and Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and Trait Dictator > 1
        and not Trait Imperator > 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Rome = romans_julii

    Affects Imperator  10  Chance  100
    Affects Princeps_Senatus  10  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Promote_to_Imperator2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and IsFactionLeader
        and Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and not Trait Imperator > 0
        and not Trait Dictator > 1
        and I_SettlementOwner Rome = romans_julii

    Affects Imperator  10  Chance  100
    Affects Princeps_Senatus  10  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Promote_to_Dictator_For_Life
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and IsFactionLeader
        and Trait Dictator = 1
        and not Trait Imperator = 1

    Affects Dictator  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Promote_to_Dictator
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and IsFactionLeader
        ;and Trait Caesar_Rebellion = 1
        and not Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and not Trait Dictator > 0
        and not Trait Imperator = 1
        and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii >= 50

    Affects Dictator  1  Chance  20
    Affects HouseCaesar  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

;Trigger Caesar_Rebellion2
;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;    
;    Condition FactionType romans_julii
;        and IsFactionLeader
;        and Trait Caesar_Rebellion = 1
;        ;and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 70
;
;    Affects Caesar_Rebellion  1  Chance  100
;
;------------------------------------------

;Trigger Caesar_Rebellion1
;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;    
;    Condition FactionType romans_julii    
;        and IsFactionLeader
;        and not Trait HouseCaesar = 1
;        and not Trait Dictator > 0
;        and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii >= 50
;
;    Affects Caesar_Rebellion  1  Chance  100
;    
;------------------------------------------;
;Trigger CaesarRebellionHeir
;    WhenToTest  CharacterTurnStart
;
;    Condition FactionType romans_julii
;        and IsFactionHeir
;        and not Trait Caesar_Rebellion > 0
;        and FactionLeaderTrait Caesar_Rebellion = 2
;
;    Affects Caesar_Rebellion  2  Chance  100
;
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Promote_to_HouseCaesar
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and not IsFactionLeader
        and not Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and FactionLeaderTrait HouseCaesar = 1

    Affects HouseCaesar  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Promote_to_HouseCaesar1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and not IsFactionLeader
        and not Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1

    Affects HouseCaesar  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Promote_to_Caesar
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType romans_julii
        and IsFactionHeir
        and Trait HouseCaesar = 1
        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
        and not Trait Imperator = 1

    Affects Caesar  1  Chance  100


;------------------------------------------
;
;Trigger Promote_to_HouseCaesar3
;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;

;        and FactionLeaderTrait Caesar_Rebellion > 0

    Condition IsFactionLeader
        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator > 0
        and IsGeneral

    Condition IsFactionLeader
        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator > 0
        and IsGeneral

;------------------------------------------;

        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator > 0
        and IsGeneral
