;===============================================================
;== Section R6 - Roman Military Career Triggers                 ==
;===============================================================
;-------Roman Awards Triggers-----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Leader_Capua
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Capua
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Leader_Arretium
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Arretium
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Leader_Trigger2
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 1
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait  1  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Leader_Trigger3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 1
          and IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait  1  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Factionwide
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionLeaderTrait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 1
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Transition_Factionwide_Force_It
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and FactionLeaderTrait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait = 1
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 0

    Affects Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2  1  Chance  100
    
;-------Roman Awards Triggers-----------------

Trigger Patella_Create_Optio
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree = 0

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  100
    Affects Plebeian_Military_Tree 1  Chance 100
    Affects Optio 1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_0
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and BattleOdds > 1.0
          and BattleOdds < 1.4
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  20
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and BattleOdds > 0.9
          and BattleOdds < 1.1
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  33
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and BattleSuccess >= average
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  48
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleOdds < 0.8
          and BattleSuccess >= close
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  60
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_4
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and BattleOdds > 1.0
          and BattleOdds < 1.4
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  10
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_5
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and BattleOdds > 0.9
          and BattleOdds < 1.1
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  16
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Patella_6
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and Trait Centurion = 1
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and BattleSuccess >= average
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Patella  1  Chance  24
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

          and WonBattle

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Phalerae_Create_Equestrian_Cavalry_Decurion_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          ;and WonBattle
          and Trait Equestrian = 1
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 0
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and Trait Patrician_Military_Tree = 0
          and Trait Roman_Cavalry_Decurion = 0

    Affects Phalerae_Cavalry  1  Chance  100
    Affects Patrician_Military_Tree 1  Chance 100
    Affects Roman_Cavalry_Decurion  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Phalerae_Create_Equestrian_Cavalry_Decurion_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
        ;and WonBattle
        and Trait Equestrian = 1
        and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 1
        and FactionType romans_julii
        and Trait Equestrian_Military_Tree = 0
        and Trait Equestrian_Praefectus_Cohortis = 0

    Affects Phalerae_Cavalry 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Military_Tree 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Praefectus_Cohortis 1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
;;because Equestrians have to use Patrician Military before reforms, and, to prevent almost
;instant promotion to Tribunus, this trigger is randomized somewhat
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Equestrian_Progress_Military_Careers_Special
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait Equestrian = 1
          and not Trait Senator = 1
          and Trait Roman_Cavalry_Decurion > 0
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 0

    Affects Patrician_Military_Tree  1  Chance 25
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Phalerae_0
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and WonBattle
          and Trait Equestrian = 1
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and BattleOdds > 1.0
          and BattleOdds < 1.4
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2

    Affects Phalerae_Cavalry  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Corona_Aurea_Is_Centurion_00
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and WonBattle
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0
          and BattleOdds > 1.0
          and BattleOdds < 1.4
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 0

    Affects Corona_Aurea  1  Chance  12
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Corona_Aurea_Is_Centurion_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and WonBattle
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0

          and BattleOdds > 0.9
          and BattleOdds < 1.1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 0

          and WonBattle
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0
          and Trait Patrician = 1
          and BattleOdds < 0.8
          and BattleSuccess >= close
          and Trait Patrician_Military_Tree > 0

    Affects Corona_Aurea  1  Chance  48

          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and BattleSuccess >= average
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0
          and Trait Legatus_Legionis = 1

    Affects Corona_Navalis  1  Chance  4
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Corona_Navalis_Legatus_Legionis_6
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 0.8
          and BattleSuccess >= close
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0
          and Trait Legatus_Legionis = 1

    Affects Corona_Navalis  1  Chance  8

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds > 0.9
          and BattleOdds < 1.1
          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
          and not Trait LostEagle > 0
          and Trait Tribunus = 1

;;;;;          and not Trait Coward > 0   ;trigger was Coward1 in RS2
;;;;;          and not Trait LostEagle > 0

Trigger Dona1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Torques = 1

    Affects Dona  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dona2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Torques = 2

    Affects Dona  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Torques = 3

    Affects Dona  3  Chance  100

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Dona = 1
          and Trait Plebeian = 1

    Affects Plebeian_Military_Tree  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Plebeian_Military_Career_End_Turn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 0

  Affects Plebeian_Military_Tree 1  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Equestrian_Military_Career_End_Turn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Equestrian = 1
          and Trait Equestrian_Military_Tree > 0
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 1

  Affects Equestrian_Military_Tree 1  Chance  90
  
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Equestrian_Military_Career_End_Turn_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Equestrian = 1
          and Trait Patrician_Military_Tree > 0
          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 0

  Affects Patrician_Military_Tree 1  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Patrician_Military_Career_End_Turn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Patrician = 1
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Patrician_Military_Tree = 0

  Affects Patrician_Military_Tree 1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Rank_Prefectus_Castrorum_01
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 4
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Prefectus_Castrorum = 0
          and Trait Tribunus = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

  Affects Prefectus_Castrorum 2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Rank_Prefectus_Castrorum_02
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 4
          and IsUnderSiege
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Prefectus_Castrorum = 0
          and Trait Tribunus = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

  Affects Prefectus_Castrorum 2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Rank_Primus_Pilus_01
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 3
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Primus_Pilus = 0
          and Trait Prefectus_Castrorum = 0
          and Trait Tribunus = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

  Affects Primus_Pilus 2  Chance  100

Trigger Military_Rank_Optio_01
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 0
          and IsUnderSiege
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Optio = 0
          and Trait Aquilifer = 0
          and Trait Centurion = 0
          and Trait Primus_Pilus = 0
          and Trait Prefectus_Castrorum = 0
          and Trait Tribunus = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

  Affects Optio 1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger EquoPublicoExornatus_Primus_Pilus_Threshold_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Equestrian = 0
          and Trait Patrician = 0
          and Trait Dona > 0
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 4
          and Trait EquoPublicoExornatus = 0

    Affects EquoPublicoExornatus 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian 3 Chance 100
    Affects RemovePlebeianCareers 4 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Military_Tree 31 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Procuratorship 2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger EquoPublicoExornatus_Primus_Pilus_Threshold_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Plebeian = 1
          and Trait Equestrian = 0
          and Trait Patrician = 0
          and Trait Dona > 1
          and Trait Plebeian_Military_Tree > 3
          and Trait EquoPublicoExornatus = 0

    Affects EquoPublicoExornatus 1 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian 3 Chance 100
    Affects RemovePlebeianCareers 4 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Military_Tree 31 Chance 100
    Affects Equestrian_Procuratorship 2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;

          and Trait Marian_Reforms_Legatus_Trait2 = 1
          and IsUnderSiege
          and Trait Legatus = 0
          and Trait Legatus_Legionis = 0

  Affects Legatus 2  Chance  100

;===============================================================
;== Section R7 - Roman Civil Career Triggers                    ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_Rank_Princeps_Senatus_End_Term
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus > 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Consul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Praetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus_Term = 1
          and Trait Imperator = 0

  Affects Former_Princeps_Senatus 2  Chance  100
  Affects Princeps_Senatus_Term_Reset 10  Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_Rank_Princeps_Senatus_Elected
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Patrician = 1
          and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 5
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Former_Censor = 1
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus = 0
          and Trait Former_Princeps_Senatus = 0
          and Trait Tribune_Plebs = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Consul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Praetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Quaestor = 0
          and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 0

  Affects Princeps_Senatus 2  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_Rank_Princeps_Senatus_ReElected
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Patrician = 1
          and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 5
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus = 0
          and Trait Former_Princeps_Senatus = 1
          and Trait Tribune_Plebs = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Consul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Praetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Quaestor = 0
          and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 0

  Affects Princeps_Senatus 2  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Patrician = 1
          and Trait Civil_Career_Restriction > 5
          and Trait Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Praetor = 0
          and Trait Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Consul = 0
          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus = 0
          and Trait Former_Princeps_Senatus = 1
          and Trait Tribune_Plebs = 0
          and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Censor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Consul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Propraetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Praetor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Imperator = 0

  Affects Former_Censor  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Civil_Rank_Princeps_Senatus_Term
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus = 1

  Affects Princeps_Senatus_Term 1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Censor_Term = 3

  Affects Censor_Election 4  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and FactionLeaderTrait Censor_Election = 1

  Affects Censor_Election 4  Chance  100

          and not IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman

          and Trait Censor_Election > 1

          and Trait Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Censor = 0
          and Trait Former_Censor = 0
          and Trait Princeps_Senatus = 0
          and Trait Former_Princeps_Senatus = 0

          and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 0

          and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 0
          and Trait Restore_Consul = 0

          and Trait Restore_Praetor = 0

          and Trait Restore_Curule_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Aedile = 0
          and Trait Restore_Former_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Restore_Quaestor = 0
          and Trait Imperator = 0

  Affects Quaestor 2  Chance  40

          and EndedInSettlement

    Condition CultureType roman

    Condition CultureType roman

  Affects Civil_Career_Restriction 1  Chance  100

    Condition CultureType roman

  Affects Civil_Career_Restriction 1  Chance  100

  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType roman

  Affects Civil_Career_Restriction 1  Chance  100

;===============================================================   
;== Section R9 - Republican Provincial Triggers        ==
;===============================================================
;;;   REPUBLICAN ;;;;;
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
        and Trait Senator = 1
        and not FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 0
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and I_SettlementOwner Messana = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Agrigentum = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = romans_julii

    Affects Propraetor_of_Sicily  3  Chance  100
    Affects Roman_Provincial_Governor  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 1

    Affects Propraetor_of_Sicily  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and SettlementName Syracuse
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 2

    Affects Propraetor_of_Sicily  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not EndedInSettlement
        and I_SettlementOwner Syracuse = romans_julii
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 3

    Affects Remove_Republican_Provincial_Governor 1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not I_SettlementOwner Syracuse = romans_julii
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 2

    Affects Remove_Republican_Provincial_Governor 1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not I_SettlementOwner Syracuse = romans_julii
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 3

    Affects Remove_Republican_Provincial_Governor 2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Sicily_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not EndedInSettlement
        and I_SettlementOwner Syracuse = romans_julii
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Sicily = 1

    Affects Propraetor_of_Sicily  1  Chance  100

Trigger Propraetor_of_Gallia_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

;Requires: Gergovia, Burdigala, Vienna, Aventicum, Vesontio, Cabillonus, 
;Lemonum, Osismia, Avaricum, Treveri, Gornacum, Batavodurum 

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
        and Trait Senator = 1
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Gallia = 0
        and not FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
        and SettlementName Gergovia
        and I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Vienna = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Aventicum = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Cabillonus = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Lemonum = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Osismia = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Avaricum = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Treveri = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Gornacum = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Batavodurum = romans_julii

    Affects Propraetor_of_Gallia  3  Chance  100
    Affects Roman_Provincial_Governor  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Propraetor_of_Gallia_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and SettlementName Gergovia
        and Trait Propraetor_of_Gallia = 1

    Affects Propraetor_of_Gallia  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not EndedInSettlement
        and I_SettlementOwner Batavodurum = romans_julii
        and Trait Imperial_Proconsul_Germania_Inferior = 1

    Affects Imperial_Proconsul_Germania_Inferior  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;

Trigger Senatorial_Propraetor_of_Bithynia_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and EndedInSettlement
        and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
        and Trait Senatorial_Propraetor_of_Bithynia = 0
        and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
        and SettlementName Nikomedia
        and I_SettlementOwner Herakleia_Pontike = romans_julii
        and I_SettlementOwner Sinope = romans_julii

    Affects Senatorial_Propraetor_of_Bithynia  3  Chance  100
    Affects Roman_Provincial_Governor  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;

;;;;;Remove other Senatorial Post while provincial governor
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Remove_Tribunus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Tribunus = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor > 0

    Affects Restore_Tribunus  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Restore_Tribunus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Restore_Tribunus = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

    Affects Tribunus  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;

        and Trait Restore_Proconsul = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

    Affects Proconsul  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Remove_Censor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Censor = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor > 0

    Affects Restore_Censor  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Restore_Censor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Restore_Censor = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

    Affects Censor  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Remove_Former_Censor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Former_Censor = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor > 0

    Affects Restore_Former_Censor  2  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Restore_Former_Censor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Restore_Former_Censor = 1
        and Trait Roman_Provincial_Governor = 0

    Affects Former_Censor  2  Chance  100   

;===============================================================
;== Section S - Carthage Government Triggers        ==
;===============================================================Carthago
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and not Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
        and not Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 1
        and not Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 1
        and not Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 1
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 5
    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 25
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 25
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 10
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 33
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 33
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 33
    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 45
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 45
    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 5
    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 45
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 60
    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 5
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 20
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 20
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 70
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 25
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 25
    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_assignment_trigger_for_any_generals_6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 0
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 0
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 3 Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_Aristocrat_Elected_General
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
        and Trait Elected_General = 0
        and Trait The_Assembly = 0
        and Trait The_Clubs = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Assembly  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_Citizens_Elected_General
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 1
        and Trait Elected_General = 0
        and Trait The_Assembly = 0
        and Trait The_Clubs = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Assembly  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_Numidian_Elected_General
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Numidian_Nobleman = 1
        and Trait Elected_General = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthaginian_Mercenary_Chieftain_Elected_General
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Mercenary_Chieftain = 1
        and Trait Elected_General = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Character_Comes_Of_Age_Carthaginian_Aristocrat
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType carthage

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_OfferedForAdoption_Carthaginian_Aristocrat
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and FatherTrait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption_Carthaginian_Aristocrat
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and IsGeneral
        and FatherTrait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Family_Member  1  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_OfferedForMarriage_Carthaginian_Aristocrat
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType carthage
        and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthage_Class_Assignment_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 1
          and Attribute Command >= 5
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0
          and Trait The_Clubs = 0

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100
  
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 1
          and Trait GoodTrader >= 3

    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100

          and Trait Carthaginian_Citizens = 1
          and Trait GoodAdministrator >= 4
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 0

    Affects The_Clubs  1  Chance  100

          and FactionType carthage

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and FactionType carthage

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 2 Chance 40
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 25
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 25
    Affects Carthaginian_Aristocrat 4 Chance 25

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and FactionType carthage

    Affects Carthaginian_Citizens 2 Chance 30
    Affects Mercenary_Chieftain 1 Chance 25
    Affects Numidian_Nobleman 2 Chance 25

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction = 0

    Affects Carthage_Government_Restriction 4  Chance  100
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthage_Government_Restriction_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction > 0
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Attribute Influence >= 4

    Affects Carthage_Government_Restriction 4  Chance  100    

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Carthage_Government_Restriction_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction > 0
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Attribute Command >= 4

    Affects Carthage_Government_Restriction 4  Chance  100

    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType carthage

    Affects Suffetes 1 Chance  100

          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Suffetes = 0

        and not IsFactionLeader

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction >= 3
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Trait Suffetes = 0
          and Trait Pentarchies = 0
          and Trait Carthaginian_Council = 0

    Affects Pentarchies 1 Chance  30

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction >= 3
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Trait Suffetes = 0
          and Trait Pentarchies = 0
          and Trait Carthaginian_Council = 3

    Affects Pentarchies 1 Chance  40

          and Trait Pentarchies = 0

          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1

          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Trait Suffetes = 0
          and Trait Pentarchies = 0
          and Trait Carthaginian_Council = 0

    Affects Carthaginian_Council 1 Chance  40

          and Trait Carthaginian_Council > 0

    Affects Carthaginian_Council 1 Chance  100

Trigger Carthage_Government_Magistrate_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Carthage_Government_Restriction > 0
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and Trait Suffetes = 0
          and Trait Elected_Magistrate = 0

    Affects Elected_Magistrate  1  Chance  25
  
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Carthaginian_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Elected_General = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100

    Affects Conquerer_of_Gaul  1  Chance  100

          and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait Imperator = 1
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Gaul = 1
;;          and Trait May_Get_This = 1

    Affects Imperial_Jealousy  1  Chance  20

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Greece_Counter = 8
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Greece_Makedonia = 1

    Affects Conquerer_of_Greece2  1  Chance  100

;-----------Roman-----------------------
Trigger Greece_Conquerer_Gain_All
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Greece_Counter = 8
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Greece_Makedonia = 1

    Affects Conquerer_of_Greece  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greece_Conquerer_Gain_Imperial
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
          and FactionLeaderTrait Imperator = 1
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait Imperator = 1
          and Trait Conquerer_of_Greece = 1
;;          and Trait May_Get_This = 1

    Affects Imperial_Jealousy  1  Chance  20

;===============================================================
;== Section X1 - Celtic Section Trait Triggers                  ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderSpain
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType spain

    Affects Faction_Leader_Spain  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderSpain2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType spain
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Faction_Leader_Spain = 0

    Affects Faction_Leader_Spain  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderBritons
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType britons

    Affects Faction_Leader_Britons  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderGalatia
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType galatians

    Affects Faction_Leader_Galatians  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderGalatia2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType galatians
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Faction_Leader_Galatians = 0

    Affects Faction_Leader_Galatians  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Galatia
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType galatians

    Affects Argos_Galatians  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Galatia2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType galatians
          and IsFactionHeir
          and Trait Argos_Galatians = 0

    Affects Argos_Galatians  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderBritons2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType britons
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Faction_Leader_Britons = 0

    Affects Faction_Leader_Britons  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Spain
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType spain

    Affects Camulos_Britons_Spain  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Spain2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType spain
        and IsFactionHeir
        and Trait Camulos_Britons_Spain = 0

    Affects Camulos_Britons_Spain  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Spain3
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType spain
        and Trait Camulos_Britons_Spain = 1

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Belgae
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType britons

    Affects Camulos_Britons_Spain  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType britons
        and IsFactionHeir
        and Trait Camulos_Britons_Spain = 0

    Affects Camulos_Britons_Spain  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType britons
        and Trait Camulos_Britons_Spain = 1

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderArverni
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType gauls

    Affects Faction_Leader_Gauls  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Faction_Leader_Gauls = 0

    Affects Faction_Leader_Gauls  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType gauls

    Affects Latis_Arverni  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and IsFactionHeir
          and Trait Latis_Arverni = 0

    Affects Latis_Arverni  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Barbarian_Heir_Arverni3
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    
    Condition FactionType gauls
          and Trait Latis_Arverni = 1

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100
    
;---------Celtic Animal Warrior Triggers--------
Trigger Celtic_Animal_Warrior_Trigger_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType spain
          and not Trait Tarvos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Turcos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Artos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Bledinos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Luco_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Caruos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Boduos_Cinges = 1

    Affects Tarvos_Cinges  1  Chance  30
    Affects Turcos_Cinges  1  Chance  30
    Affects Artos_Cinges  1  Chance  30 
    Affects Bledinos_Cinges  1  Chance  30 
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Celtic_Animal_Warrior_Trigger_05
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType spain
          and not Trait Tarvos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Turcos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Artos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Bledinos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Luco_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Caruos_Cinges = 1
          and not Trait Boduos_Cinges = 1

    Affects Luco_Cinges  1  Chance  30
    Affects Caruos_Cinges  1  Chance  30
    Affects Boduos_Cinges  1  Chance  30

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType britons

    Affects Iceni  2  Chance  100

    Condition FactionType britons
        and FatherTrait Iceni = 1

          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait Not_Arevaci = 0

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType spain
          and Trait Family_Member = 1
          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType spain
          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait Not_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance  30
    Affects Not_Arevaci  1  Chance  60

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType spain
          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait Not_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance  60
    Affects Not_Arevaci  1  Chance  60

          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait Not_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance  80
    Affects Not_Arevaci  1  Chance  80

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType spain
          and Trait Is_Arevaci = 0
          and Trait Not_Arevaci = 0

    Affects Not_Arevaci  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

          and FactionType spain

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance 100

     Condition not AgentType = admiral
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionType spain

    Affects Is_Arevaci  2  Chance 50
    Affects Not_Arevaci  1  Chance 50

;--------All Barbs\Nomads------------------------
Trigger Skill_Barbarian_Nomad_Governing_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait Thinker > 0

    Affects Thinker  2  Chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Skill_Barbarian_Nomad_Governing_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and CultureType nomad
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 0
          and not Trait Deranged > 0
          and not Trait Thinker > 0
          and Trait Sedentary = 1

    Affects Thinker  2  Chance  8 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Skill_Barbarian_Nomad_Governing_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Thinker > 0
          and Trait May_Get_This = 1

    Affects Thinker  1  Chance  8
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait Thinker > 0
          and Trait May_Get_This = 1

    Affects Thinker  1  Chance  8

          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and Trait Thinker > 0

          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and Trait PublicFaith >= 1

Trigger Acitouiros_Battle_Crushing_victory_Uses_Cavalry
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry >= 50
          and Trait Acitouiros = 0

    Affects Acitouiros  1  Chance  100

          and Trait Galba = 0

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
          and Trait Balcos = 0

    Affects Balcos  1  Chance  100 
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Circios_Battle_Ambush_Failed
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
          and not WonBattle
          and WasAttacker
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans
          and not Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Trait Circios = 0

    Affects Circios  1  Chance  10

          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType germans

          and BattleSuccess >= close
          and WonBattle

          and not FactionType germans
          and not Trait Sentuuiros = 3

          and not Trait Sentuuiros = 3

;===============================================================
;== Section X2 - Dacian\Germanic Section Trait Triggers          ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderSuebi
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType germans

    Affects FactionleaderSuebi  1  Chance  100
    
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger tribe_assigment_start_Suebi_trigger_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribe_assigment_start_Suebi_trigger_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribe_assigment_start_Suebi_trigger_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0
          and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;---------------cleanup-----------------
Trigger tribe_assigment_start_Suebi_trigger_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0

    Affects Not_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Suebi_Diplomat_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionType germans

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance 100        
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Suebi_spy_Assassin_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not AgentType = admiral
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionType germans

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance 100
    
;----------Suebi Tribal Triggers-----------------
Trigger tribe_assigment_start_Suebi_trigger_00
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Family_Member = 1
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;----------Suebi Tribal Triggers-----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribe_Suebi_trigger_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType germans

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;----------Suebi Tribal Triggers-----------------
Trigger tribe_Suebi_trigger_02
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait Is_Suebi = 0

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Character_After_Offered_For_Adoption_Suebi_01
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType germans

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Character_After_Offered_For_Adoption_Suebi_02
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType germans

    Affects Is_Suebi  2  Chance  100
    
;----------Dacian Tribal Triggers-----------------

;------------------------------------------
;---Thracian Tribes Trigger----------------
;------------------------------------------ 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Bessoi
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Bessoi > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Bessoi  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Odrissai
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Odrissai > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Odrissai  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Getai
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Getai > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Getai  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Bastarnae_Thrace
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Bastarnae > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Bastarnae  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Inconsequential_Thracian_Tribe
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Inconsequential_Tribe2 > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Inconsequential_Tribe2  1  Chance  100  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Respected_Thracian_Tribe
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Respected_Tribe2 > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Respected_Tribe2  1  Chance  100  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Thracian_Worthy_Of_Marriage_VnV_Trigger_01
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition Trait BeingThracian > 0

    Affects Bessoi  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Odrissai  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Getai  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Bastarnae  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Thracian_Worthy_Of_Marriage_VnV_Trigger_02
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition Trait BeingThracian > 0
          and Trait Bessoi = 0
          and Trait Odrissai = 0
          and Trait Getai = 0
          and Trait Bastarnae = 0

    Affects Inconsequential_Tribe2  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Respected_Tribe2  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Thracian_Worthy_Of_Marriage_VnV_Trigger_Safety_01
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Bessoi > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian > 0
          and not Trait Bessoi > 0
          and not Trait Odrissai > 0
          and not Trait Getai > 0
          and not Trait Bastarnae > 0
          and not Trait Inconsequential_Tribe2 > 0
          and not Trait Respected_Tribe2 > 0

    Affects Bessoi  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

;===============================================================
;== Section X3 - Scythian\Sarmatian Section   Trait Triggers    ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_class_assignment_trigger01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Sedentary 1 Chance 10
    Affects Warriors 1 Chance 70
    Affects Royal_Clans 2 Chance 20
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_class_assignment_trigger02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Sedentary 1 Chance 10
    Affects Warriors 1 Chance 80
    Affects Royal_Clans 2 Chance 80
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_class_assignment_trigger03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Sedentary 1 Chance 15
    Affects Warriors 1 Chance 80
    Affects Royal_Clans 2 Chance 80
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_Diplomat_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and CultureType nomad

    Affects Royal_Clans  2  Chance 100        
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_spy_Assassin_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not AgentType = admiral
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and CultureType nomad

    Affects Warriors  1  Chance 50
    Affects Sedentary  1  Chance 50
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_class_assignment_trigger00
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Family_Member = 1
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0

    Affects Royal_Clans 2 Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_Comes_Of_Age_Royal_Clans
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad

    Affects Royal_Clans  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------;
Trigger Character_OfferedForMarriage_Royal_Clans1
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0
        
    Affects Royal_Clans  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Nomad_cleanup_trigger00
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType nomad
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Sedentary = 0
        and Trait Warriors = 0
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 0

    Affects Royal_Clans 2 Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType scythia
        and IsGeneral
        and Trait Royal_Clans = 1
        and Trait Siracae = 0

    Affects Siracae  2  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait Warriors = 1
          and not Trait Iazyges = 1
          and not Trait Roxolani = 1
          and not Trait Aorsi = 1
          and not Trait Alans = 1
          and not Trait Sauromatae = 1

    Affects Iazyges  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait Warriors = 1
          and not Trait Iazyges = 1
          and not Trait Roxolani = 1
          and not Trait Aorsi = 1
          and not Trait Alans = 1
          and not Trait Sauromatae = 1

    Affects Roxolani  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait Warriors = 1
          and not Trait Iazyges = 1
          and not Trait Roxolani = 1
          and not Trait Aorsi = 1
          and not Trait Alans = 1
          and not Trait Sauromatae = 1

    Affects Aorsi  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait Warriors = 1
          and not Trait Iazyges = 1
          and not Trait Roxolani = 1
          and not Trait Aorsi = 1
          and not Trait Alans = 1
          and not Trait Sauromatae = 1

    Affects Alans  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger tribal_assignment_trigger_for_sarmatians_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait Warriors = 1
          and not Trait Iazyges = 1
          and not Trait Roxolani = 1
          and not Trait Aorsi = 1
          and not Trait Alans = 1
          and not Trait Sauromatae = 1

    Affects Sauromatae  1  Chance  30
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FactionleaderSarmatian
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    
    Condition FactionType scythia

    Affects FactionleaderSarmatian  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Heroic_Wife_Nomad_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    
    Condition WonBattle
          and not Trait City_Has_Governor > 0
          and not Trait Sedentary = 1
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral > 1
          and Attribute Command >= 3
          and not Trait Fighting_Wife > 0

    Affects Fighting_Wife  2  Chance  5
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Heroic_Wife_Nomad_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait Fighting_Wife > 0

    Affects Fighting_Wife  1  Chance  10
    
;===============================================================
;== Section Y - Hellenistic Leadership Trait Triggers    ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
;Greek Class System
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_ComesOfAge_01a
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    
    Condition CultureType greek
        and not FactionType sparta

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
    
;Remove:   and not FactionType greek_cities   ;;swap faction only
;from these triggers, down to where military careers start  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_02a
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType sparta
          and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 0
          and Trait Family_Member = 1

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_03a
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition CultureType greek
        and not FactionType sparta

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
      
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_04a
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType greek
        and not FactionType sparta
        and FatherTrait Greek_Aristocrat = 1

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_05a
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType greek
        and not FactionType sparta
        and FatherTrait Greek_Aristocrat = 1

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100
    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Class_Assignment_05c
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType greek
        and not FactionType sparta
        and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 1
        and Trait Elected_General = 0

    Affects Elected_General  1  Chance  100
;;;;;;    Affects Ephebian  1  Chance  100
        
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType sparta
          and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 0
          and Trait Greek_Military_Career_Infantry = 5

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat  4  Chance  100

          and CultureType greek

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType pergamon
        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Engineer_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Cavalry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 10

        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 30

Trigger Greek_Free_Greek_Class_Assignment_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType greek_cities
        and IsGeneral
        and not Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 1
        and not Trait Greek_Non_Aristocrat = 1
        and not Trait Mixed_Heritage = 1
        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

    Affects Greek_Aristocrat 4 Chance 10
    Affects Greek_Non_Aristocrat 2 Chance 25
    Affects Mixed_Heritage 1 Chance 20

        and Trait MoHAdopted = 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Career_Seleucid_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType seleucid
        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Engineer_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Cavalry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 10
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Career_Seleucid_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType seleucid
        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Engineer_Career = 0
        
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 20
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 20
    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 80
    Affects Chooses_Cavalry_Career 1 Chance 80

;---------Carthage Generals Only-----------------
Trigger Military_Career_Carthage_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType carthage
        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Engineer_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Cavalry_Career 1 Chance 50
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 10
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType carthage
        and Trait Elected_General = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Cavalry_Career = 0
        and Trait Chooses_Engineer_Career = 0
        
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 20
    Affects Chooses_Engineer_Career 1 Chance 20
    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 80
    Affects Chooses_Cavalry_Career 1 Chance 80

Trigger Military_Career_Infantry_Sparta_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and Trait Spartiates = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and not EndedInSettlement
        and Trait Perioikoi = 1
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 0

    Affects Chooses_Infantry_Career 1 Chance 100

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Chooses_Infantry_Career = 1
        and Trait Battle_Counter > 0
        and Trait Greek_Military_Career_Infantry = 0

    Affects Greek_Military_Career_Infantry  2  Chance  100

          and Trait Battle_Counter > 0

          and Trait Greek_Military_Career_Infantry > 0

    Affects Greek_Military_Career_Infantry  1  Chance  100

;Greek Career Triggers
;------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Civil_Career_Greeks_Less_Sparta_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType sparta
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 1
          and not Trait Administrative_Career > 0
          and not Trait Financial_Career > 0
          and not Trait Record_Keeping_Career > 0
          and not Trait Archimedes_School_Engineering > 0
    
    Affects Administrative_Career  1  Chance  15
    Affects Financial_Career  1  Chance  15
    Affects Archimedes_School_Engineering  1  Chance  15
    Affects Record_Keeping_Career  1  Chance  15
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Civil_Career_Greeks_Less_Sparta_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType sparta
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 1
          and not Trait Administrative_Career > 0
          and not Trait Financial_Career > 0
          and not Trait Record_Keeping_Career > 0
          and not Trait Archimedes_School_Engineering > 0
    
    Affects Archimedes_School_Engineering  1  Chance  25
    Affects Record_Keeping_Career  1  Chance  25
    Affects Administrative_Career  1  Chance  25
    Affects Financial_Career  1  Chance  25
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Civil_Career_Greeks_Less_Sparta_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType sparta
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Slow > 1
          and not Trait Administrative_Career > 0
          and not Trait Financial_Career > 0
          and not Trait Record_Keeping_Career > 0
          and not Trait Archimedes_School_Engineering > 0
    
    Affects Record_Keeping_Career  1  Chance  45
    Affects Administrative_Career  1  Chance  45
    Affects Financial_Career  1  Chance  45
    Affects Archimedes_School_Engineering  1  Chance  25
    
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Greek_Civil_Engineering_Career_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Archimedes_School_Engineering = 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_1 = 0
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_2 = 0
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_3 = 0
    
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_1  2  Chance  10
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_2  2  Chance  20
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_3  2  Chance  5  
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Archimedes_School_Engineering = 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_1 = 0
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_2 = 0
          and Trait Greek_Engineering_Career_3 = 0
    
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_3  2  Chance  20
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_2  2  Chance  5
    Affects Greek_Engineering_Career_1  2  Chance  20

Trigger Hegemon_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader 
        and FactionType egypt
        and Trait Hegemon = 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Athens = egypt
        and I_SettlementOwner Corinth = egypt
        and I_SettlementOwner Orchomenos = egypt
        and I_SettlementOwner Thermon = egypt

    Affects Hegemon  1  Chance  100

          and EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType seleucid

          and Trait Greek_Government_Boule = 0
          and not Trait Greek_Government_Jurist2 = 1

;------------------------------------------Boule
