    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
          and Attribute Influence > 6
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Trait Greek_Aristocrat = 1
          and Trait Greek_Government_Boule = 0
          and not Trait Greek_Government_Jurist2 = 1
    
    Affects Greek_Government_Boule  1  Chance  30
    

;-----------Greek Epithet Triggers-------------    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Epithets_Random
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType thrace
          and Trait Nikator < 1
          and Trait Soter < 1
          and Trait Megas < 1
          and Trait Callinicus < 1
          and Trait Epiphanes < 1
          and Trait Eurgetes < 1
          and Trait Poliorketes < 1
          and Trait Philadelphus < 1
          and Trait Keraunos < 1
          and Trait Philoromaeus < 1
          and Trait Nikeforos < 1
          and Trait Barypos < 1
          and Trait Philopator < 1
          and Trait Philometor < 1
          and Trait Zabinas < 1
          and Trait Theos < 1
          and Trait Dionysos < 1
          and Trait Physcon < 1
          and Trait Pogon < 1
          and Trait Monophthalmus < 1
          and Trait Kalos < 1
          and Trait Aniketos < 1
          and Trait Hierax < 1
          and Trait Gonatas < 1

    Affects Eurgetes  3  Chance  5 
    Affects Barypos  3  Chance  3 
    Affects Philopator  3  Chance  7 
    Affects Philometor  3  Chance  3 
    Affects Zabinas  3  Chance  1 
    Affects Physcon  3  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

          and Trait Hierax < 1
          and Trait Gonatas < 1

    Affects Aniketos  3  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Epithet_Hierax_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType thrace
          and Trait Scout = 3
          and Attribute Command > 4
          and Trait Hierax = 0
          and Trait Nikator < 1
          and Trait Soter < 1
          and Trait Megas < 1
          and Trait Callinicus < 1
          and Trait Epiphanes < 1
          and Trait Eurgetes < 1
          and Trait Poliorketes < 1
          and Trait Philadelphus < 1
          and Trait Keraunos < 1
          and Trait Philoromaeus < 1
          and Trait Nikeforos < 1
          and Trait Barypos < 1
          and Trait Philopator < 1
          and Trait Philometor < 1
          and Trait Zabinas < 1
          and Trait Theos < 1
          and Trait Dionysos < 1
          and Trait Physcon < 1
          and Trait Pogon < 1
          and Trait Monophthalmus < 1
          and Trait Kalos < 1
          and Trait Aniketos < 1
          and Trait Hierax < 1
          and Trait Gonatas < 1

    Affects Hierax  3  Chance  100

;===============================================================
;== Section Z - Spartan Trait Triggers                        ==
;===============================================================
;Character comes of age section
;This is strictly for children of family members
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Spartiates_00
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType sparta
          and AgentType = family
          and FatherTrait Spartiates > 0

    Affects Spartiates  1  Chance  100      
    Affects gSpartan  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Spartiates_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType sparta
          and AgentType = family
          and FatherTrait Spartiates > 0
          and Trait Personality_Slow = 0
          and Trait Haemophobic = 0
          and Trait Coward = 0
          and Trait Aesthetic = 0
          and Trait Personality_Procrastinator = 0
          and Trait Hypochondriac = 0
          and Trait Deranged = 0
    
    Affects Spartan_Agoge  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Spartiates_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType sparta
          and AgentType = family
          and Trait Spartan_Agoge > 0
          and not Trait Spartan_Agoge > 2
          and not Trait Perioikoi = 1

    Affects Spartan_Agoge  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Spartiates_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType sparta
          and Trait Spartiates > 0

    Affects gSpartan  1  Chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Spartiates_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType sparta
          and AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Sparta
          and not Trait Spartiates > 0

    Affects Perioikoi  1  Chance  100
    Affects gSpartan  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Krypteia_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType sparta
        and AgentType = family
        and Trait Spartiates > 0
        and Trait Spartan_Agoge = 2
        and Trait Krypteia = 0

    Affects Krypteia  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    
    Condition FactionType sparta
        and Trait GreekleaderSparta > 0

    Affects GreekleaderSparta  Lose 1  Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    
    Condition FactionType sparta
        and Trait GreekleaderSparta2 > 0

    Affects GreekleaderSparta2  Lose 1  Chance 100

        and Trait Agiads > 0

Trigger Spartan_Dynasty_Assignment_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and Trait Spartiates > 0
        and FatherTrait Agiads > 0

    Affects Agiads  4  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and Trait Spartiates > 0
        and FatherTrait Eurypontids > 0

    Affects Eurypontids  4  Chance  100
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Gerontes_Assignment_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait Spartiates = 1
        and Trait Krypteia = 1
        and Trait CharacterAges >= 4
        and not Trait Ephors < 3

    Affects Gerontes  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Ephors_Assignment_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and not IsFactionLeader
        and not IsFactionHeir
        and Trait Spartiates = 1
        and Trait Krypteia = 1
        and Trait CharacterAges >= 2
        and Trait Ephors = 0
        and Trait Former_Ephors = 0
        
    Affects Ephors  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Ephors_Assignment_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and Trait Ephors > 0

    Affects Ephors  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Ephors_Assignment_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and Trait Ephors >= 3

    Affects Former_Ephors  4  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Ecclesia_Assignment_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
        and FactionType sparta
        and not IsFactionLeader
        and not IsFactionHeir
        and Trait Spartiates = 1

    Affects Ecclesia  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spartan_Diplomat_01
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionType sparta

    Affects Spartiates  1  Chance 100        
    Affects Ecclesia  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and FactionType sparta

    Affects Neodamodeis  1  Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and FactionType sparta

    Affects Neodamodeis  1  Chance 100

;===============================================================
;== Section AB - Victors & Cognomens Module                   ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
;--Alexander Triggers----------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture barbarian
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction macedon
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_04
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction greek_cities
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_05
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction thrace
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_06
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction spain
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Europe_07
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction bosporan
          and Trait gVictorEurope < 1

    Affects gVictorEurope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Africa_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture egyptian
          and Trait gVictorAfrica < 1

    Affects gVictorAfrica  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Africa_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction carthage
          and Trait gVictorAfrica < 1

    Affects gVictorAfrica  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Africa_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction numidia
          and Trait gVictorAfrica < 1

    Affects gVictorAfrica  1  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Asia_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern
          and Trait gVictorAsia < 1

    Affects gVictorAsia  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Asia_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtFaction seleucid
          and Trait gVictorAsia < 1

    Affects gVictorAsia  1  Chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger gAlex_Great_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait gVictorEurope > 0
          and Trait gVictorAfrica > 0
          and Trait gVictorAsia > 0

    Affects gGreat  5  Chance  100

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2

    Affects SedentryLifeNomadVice  1  Chance  1

;---Barbarian's Skill Triggers-------------
;------------------------------------------
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianHuntingSkill_trigger_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianHuntingSkill_trigger_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_villa
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianHuntingSkill_trigger_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_palace
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = proconsuls_palace
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  2  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and InBarbarianLands
          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BarbarianHuntingSkill >= 1

    Affects BarbarianHuntingSkill  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_villa
          and Trait BarbarianCraftandArt <= 2
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianCraftandArt  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianCraftandArt_trigger_09
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_palace
          and Trait BarbarianCraftandArt <= 2
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianCraftandArt  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianWarriorSkill_trigger_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianWarriorSkill  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianWarriorSkill_trigger_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianWarriorSkill  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianWarriorSkill_trigger_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianWarriorSkill  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianWarriorSkill_trigger_04
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and CultureType barbarian
        
    Affects BarbarianWarriorSkill  1  Chance  7 
    
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_palace
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianWarriorSkill  1  Chance  1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_Barrack_trigger_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Drink > 0
          and Trait Drink < 3
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Despoiler > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Brave > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Trusting > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Just > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait KindRuler > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0
          and not Trait Generous > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_08
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Generous > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_09
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Feck > 0
          and not Trait Paranoia > 0
          and not Trait Haemophobic > 0

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BarbarianBandOfBrothers_selfperpetuating_10
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BarbarianBandOfBrothers >= 1
          and CultureType barbarian

    Affects BarbarianBandOfBrothers  1  Chance  3


;===============================================================
;== Section AD - Ethnic Traits Module                         ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
;---Slave Trigger--------------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Slave
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingOutcast  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Slave
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingOutcast  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Slave
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingOutcast  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Slave
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingOutcast  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
;---Rootless Trigger-----------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_01
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition not FactionType gauls
          and not FactionType britons
          and not FactionType spain
          and not Trait BeingHellenic > 0

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_02
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition FactionType gauls
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_03
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition FactionType britons
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_04
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition FactionType spain
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_05
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition not FactionType thrace
          and not FactionType pontus
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rootless_Trait_06
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType seleucid
;          and not FactionType baktria
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0

    Affects Rootless  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Rootless
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Rootless > 0

    Affects Partially_Integrated  1  Chance  100  

;------------------------------------------
;---Jewish Trigger-------------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Jewish
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingJewish  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
;---Roman Trigger--------------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Roman
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingRoman > 0

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingRoman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Roman
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingRoman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Roman
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingRoman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Roman
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingRoman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Roman
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Romans1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave
          and FatherTrait BeingOutcast > 0

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType slave
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1

          and Trait BeingPersian < 1

          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingRoman  1  Chance  100

          and Trait BeingIberian < 1

          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1

    Affects BeingHellenic  1  Chance  100

          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingThracian > 0
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1

          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingPersian > 0

          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1

          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1

;---Carthage Trigger-----------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried = 0
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects MarriedWithLibyan  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried = 0
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithLibyan > 0

    Affects MarriedWithIberian  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried = 0
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithLibyan > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithIberian > 0

    Affects MarriedWithCeltiberian  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsMarried
          and Trait BeenMarried = 0
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithLibyan > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithIberian > 0
          and not Trait MarriedWithCeltiberian > 0

    Affects MarriedWithHellenic  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MarriedWithLibyan = 1
          and Trait Divorced > 0

    Affects MarriedWithLibyan  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family7
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MarriedWithIberian = 1
          and Trait Divorced > 0

    Affects MarriedWithIberian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family8
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MarriedWithCeltiberian = 1
          and Trait Divorced > 0

    Affects MarriedWithCeltiberian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Punic_family9
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait MarriedWithHellenic = 1
          and Trait Divorced > 0

    Affects MarriedWithHellenic  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Punic1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingPunic > 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithLibyan = 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithIberian = 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithCeltiberian = 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithHellenic = 0

    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingPunic  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Punic2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingPunic > 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithLibyan > 0

    Affects BeingLibyan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingLibyan  2  Chance  17 


;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingPunic > 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithIberian > 0

    Affects BeingPuno-Iberian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingPuno-Iberian  2  Chance  17 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Punic4
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingPunic > 0
          and FatherTrait MarriedWithCeltiberian > 0

    Affects BeingPuno-Celtiberian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingPuno-Celtiberian  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

          and FatherTrait MarriedWithHellenic > 0

          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingPunic < 1

          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1

          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1

    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  70 
    Affects BeingBerber  1  Chance  10
    Affects BeingLibyan  1  Chance  5
    Affects BeingPuno-Iberian  1  Chance  5

    Affects BeingPuno-Hellenic  1  Chance  5

Trigger Convert_Carthage
    WhenToTest AcceptBribe

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1


    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Carthage1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and FatherTrait BeingOutcast > 0

    Affects BeingLibyan  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Carthage2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType carthage
          and Trait BeingRoman < 1
          and Trait BeingHellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingEgyptian < 1
          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1
          and Trait BeingBaktrian < 1
          and Trait BeingAnatolian < 1
          and Trait BeingGerman < 1
          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1
          and Trait BeingSarmatian < 1
          and Trait BeingThracian < 1
          and Trait BeingJewish < 1
          and Trait BeingIllyrian < 1
          and Trait BeingPunic < 1
          and Trait BeingBerber < 1
          and Trait BeingLibyan < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Celtiberian < 1
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic < 1
          and Trait BeingPersian < 1
          and Trait BeingPahlavan < 1
          and Trait BeingArmenian < 1
          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1
          and Trait BeingOutcast < 1


    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  100

Trigger Adopt_Berber_Numidia
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType numidia
          and FactionLeaderTrait BeingBerber > 0

    Affects BeingBerber  1  Chance  80
    Affects BeingLibyan  1  Chance  10
    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  10
    Affects BeingBerber  2  Chance  17

          and Trait BeingNubian < 1
          and Trait BeingIndian < 1

          and Trait BeingCelt < 1
          and Trait BeingIberian < 1
          and Trait BeingScythian < 1

          and Trait BeingThracian < 1

          and Trait BeingArab < 1
          and Trait BeingEthiopian < 1
          and Trait BeingBabylonian < 1

Trigger This_is_Roman_01
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait BeingRoman > 0

    Affects BeingRoman  2  Chance  30

    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait BeingRoman > 0

    Affects BeingRoman  3  Chance  50

          and WonBattle
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait BeingRoman > 0

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Greek_01
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

    Condition not CultureType carthaginian
          and not CultureType roman
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType gauls
          and not FactionType britons
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType galatians
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType scythia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0

    Affects BeingHellenic  2  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not CultureType roman
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType gauls
          and not FactionType britons
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType galatians
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType scythia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0

    Affects BeingHellenic  1  Chance  15

          and not FactionType scythia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0
          and Trait PoliticsSkill > 1

    Affects BeingHellenic  1  Chance  1

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger This_is_Greek_20
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;
;;    Condition not CultureType carthaginian
;;          and not CultureType roman
;;          and not FactionType germans
;;          and not FactionType gauls
;;          and not FactionType britons

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType carthaginian
          and not CultureType roman
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType gauls
          and not FactionType britons
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType galatians
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType scythia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0
          and Trait CapturedEagle > 1

    Affects BeingHellenic  1  Chance  1

;--This is Egyptian------------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Egyptian_01
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

    Condition FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingEgyptian > 0

    Affects BeingEgyptian  2  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Egyptian_02
    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingEgyptian > 0

    Affects BeingEgyptian  3  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Egyptian_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingEgyptian > 0

    Affects BeingEgyptian  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingEgyptian > 0

    Affects BeingEgyptian  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_01
    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0

    Affects BeingCelt  3  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0

    Affects BeingCelt  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_03
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0

    Affects BeingCelt  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_04
    WhenToTest LeaderDestroyedFaction

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0

    Affects BeingCelt  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0
          and Trait GoodAttacker > 2

    Affects BeingCelt  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Celt_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not CultureType carthaginian
          and not FactionType parthia
          and not FactionType armenia
          and not FactionType dacia
          and Trait BeingCelt > 0
          and Trait Drink > 0
          and Trait Drink < 4

    Affects BeingCelt  1  Chance  1

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

;------------------------------------------
;--This is Iberian-------------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Iberian_01
    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingIberian > 0

    Affects BeingIberian  3  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Iberian_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingIberian > 0

    Affects BeingIberian  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Iberian_03
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingIberian > 0

    Affects BeingIberian  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Iberian_04
    WhenToTest LeaderDestroyedFaction

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingIberian > 0

    Affects BeingIberian  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingIberian > 0
          and Trait GoodDefender > 2

    Affects BeingIberian  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait BeingBabylonian > 0

    Affects BeingBabylonian  1  Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
;--This is Jewish--------------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_01
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  2  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_02
    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  3  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_04
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_05
    WhenToTest LeaderDestroyedFaction

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait GoodCommander > 2

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait GoodAmbusher > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Xenophobia > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait PublicFaith > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait VictorOthersVirtue > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait AssassinMaster > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait CounterSpy > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait GoodFarmer > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_14
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait GoodTrader > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_15
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Generous > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Scout > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait GoodInfantryGeneral > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

Trigger This_is_Jewish_18
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Fertile > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_19
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Cheapskate > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait ReligiousMania > 0
          and Trait ReligiousMania < 3

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_21
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Pious > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and Trait CapturedEagle > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and Trait Negotiation > 1

    Affects BeingJewish  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Jewish_25
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Jerusalem
          and SettlementBuildingExists > temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and Trait BeingJewish > 0

    Affects BeingJewish  2  Chance  10


;------------------------------------------
;--This is Punic---------------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Punic_01
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects BeingPunic  2  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Punic_02
    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects BeingPunic  3  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Punic_03
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger This_is_Punic_04
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LeaderDestroyedFaction

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0

    Affects BeingPunic  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPunic > 0
          and Trait Sobriety > 1

    Affects BeingPunic  1  Chance  3

    Condition Trait BeingBerber > 0

    Affects BeingBerber  1  Chance  30

    WhenToTest RefuseBribe

    Condition Trait BeingBerber > 0

    Affects BeingBerber  3  Chance  50

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingLibyan > 0

    Affects BeingLibyan  1  Chance  30

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType greek
          and not CultureType eastern
          and not FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian > 0

    Affects BeingPuno-Iberian  1  Chance  30

          and not CultureType greek

          and not FactionType egypt
          and Trait BeingPuno-Iberian > 0

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType eastern
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic > 0
          and Trait GoodCommander > 2

    Affects BeingPuno-Hellenic  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType eastern
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait BeingPuno-Hellenic > 0
          and Trait GoodSiegeAttacker > 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_romanpoliticalparty_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Patrician > 0

    Affects Optimates  1  Chance  70 
    Affects Populares  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_romanpoliticalparty_02
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Equestrian > 0

    Affects Optimates  1  Chance  40 
    Affects Populares  1  Chance  60 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Plebeian > 0

    Affects Optimates  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Populares  1  Chance  95

          and Trait Optimates < 1
          and Trait Populares < 1
          and Trait Patrician > 0

;---German Tribes Trigger------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Ingaevonic
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Ingaevonic >= 1
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Ingaevonic  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingGerman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Teuton
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Teuton >= 1
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Teuton  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingGerman  2  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Cimbric
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Cimbric >= 1
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Cimbric  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingGerman  2  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Marcomannic >= 1
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Marcomannic  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BeingGerman  2  Chance  3 
    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence1  1  Chance  5

Trigger Germans_Worthy_Of_Marriage_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Ingaevonic  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Teuton  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Lombard  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Inconsequential_Tribe  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Respected_Tribe  1  Chance  3 
    Affects BeingGerman 1  Chance  17

          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Cimbric  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Ambronic  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Inconsequential_Tribe  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Respected_Tribe  1  Chance  3

    Condition FactionType germans
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1

    Affects Inconsequential_Tribe  1  Chance  1

Trigger Germans_Worthy_Of_Marriage_VnV_Trigger_Safety1
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Ingaevonic >= 1
          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1
          and not Trait Ingaevonic >= 1
          and not Trait Teuton >= 1
          and not Trait Lombard >= 1
          and not Trait Cimbric >= 1
          and not Trait Ambronic >= 1
          and not Trait Marcomannic >= 1
          and not Trait Chatti >= 1
          and not Trait Bastarnae >= 1
          and not Trait Inconsequential_Tribe >= 1
          and not Trait Respected_Tribe >= 1
          and FactionType germans

    Affects Ingaevonic  1  Chance  100

          and Trait BeingGerman >= 1
          and not Trait Ingaevonic >= 1
          and not Trait Teuton >= 1
          and not Trait Lombard >= 1
          and not Trait Cimbric >= 1
          and not Trait Ambronic >= 1
          and not Trait Marcomannic >= 1
          and not Trait Chatti >= 1
          and not Trait Bastarnae >= 1
          and not Trait Inconsequential_Tribe >= 1
          and not Trait Respected_Tribe >= 1
          and FactionType germans

    Affects Teuton  1  Chance  100

;---Hellenist Trigger----------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not FatherTrait BeingHellenic > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  60 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_02
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingEgyptian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_03
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait BeingAnatolian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_04
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not Trait BeingHellenic > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  60 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_05
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingEgyptian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_06
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingAnatolian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not Trait BeingHellenic > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  60 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingEgyptian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hellenist_Trait_09
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingAnatolian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not Trait BeingHellenic > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  60

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition Trait BeingEgyptian > 0 

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  50

    Affects Hellenist  1  Chance  70

;== TRIGGER SIDE OF GREEK CIVIL WAR ==

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_greekpoliticalparty_Attalid_01
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType greek
          and FactionLeaderTrait Attalid > 0
          and Trait Oligoarch = 0
          and Trait Democrat = 0

    Affects Oligoarch  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0
          and Trait Seleucid = 0
          and Trait Antigonid = 0
          and Trait Ptolemaic = 0
          and Trait Attalid = 0
          and Trait Spartocid = 0
          and Trait Oligoarch = 0
          and Trait Democrat = 0

    Affects Democrat  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_greekpoliticalparty_Safety_NotGCS
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CultureType greek
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType seleucid
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not FactionType thrace
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0
          and Trait Seleucid = 0
          and Trait Antigonid = 0
          and Trait Ptolemaic = 0
          and Trait Attalid = 0
          and Trait Spartocid = 0
          and Trait Oligoarch = 0
          and Trait Democrat = 0

    Affects Oligoarch  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;---gSpartan Trigger-----------------------
;------------------------------------------

Trigger gSpartan02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Spartan_Agoge > 0

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  1
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  1
    Affects Authoritarian  1  Chance  1
    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  1
    Affects Superstitious  1  Chance  1

;-Greek Cities - Assign City
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assign_City_Athenian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait TurnsAlive2 < 2
          and Trait BeingHellenic > 0
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Athens
          and Trait gSpartan < 1
          and Trait Seleucid < 1
          and Trait Antigonid < 1
          and Trait Ptolemaic < 1
          and Trait Attalid < 1
          and Trait Spartocid < 1
          and Trait Athenian < 1
          and Trait Rhodian < 1
          and Trait Lesbian < 1
          and Trait Euboean < 1
          and Trait Chersonesosian < 1
          and Trait Olbian < 1
          and Trait Panticapaeumian < 1
          and Trait Phanagorian < 1
          and Trait Sinopic < 1
          and Trait Tanaisan < 1
          and Trait Tomisian < 1
          and Trait Trapezian < 1
          and Trait Ephesian < 1
          and Trait Halicarnassian < 1
          and Trait Nicomedian < 1
          and Trait Pergamian < 1
          and Trait Sardisan < 1
          and Trait Sidian < 1
          and Trait Amphipolisan < 1
          and Trait Apollonian < 1
          and Trait Byzantian < 1
          and Trait Epirote < 1
          and Trait Thessalian < 1
          and Trait Aetolian < 1
          and Trait Megalopolisan < 1
          and Trait Corinthian < 1
          and Trait Akragasan < 1
          and Trait Crotonean < 1
          and Trait Rhegian < 1
          and Trait Syracusan < 1
          and Trait Tarentian < 1
          and Trait Alalian < 1
          and Trait Emporionian < 1
          and Trait Massilian < 1
          and Trait Cretan < 1
          and Trait Cypriot < 1
          and Trait Cyrenian < 1

    Affects Athenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;---Celtic Tribes Trigger------------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Celt_Galatian_Pontus
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingCelt >= 1

    Affects Galatian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence2  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Celt_Galatian_Pontus2
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingCelt >= 1

    Affects Galatian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence2  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Celt_Galatian_Pontus
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingCelt >= 1

    Affects Galatian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence2  1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Celt_Galatian_Pontus
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingCelt >= 1

    Affects Galatian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Celt_Galatian_Galatians
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType galatians

          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Allobroges < 1
          and Trait Aquitani < 1
          and Trait Arverni < 1
          and Trait Bituriges < 1
          and Trait Boii < 1

          and Trait Silures < 1
          and Trait Eburones < 1
          and Trait Treveri < 1
          and Trait Remi < 1

    Affects Western_Civilized_Influence1  1  Chance  5

Trigger dads_Astur
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and FatherTrait Astur >= 1
          and Trait BeingIberian >= 1

    Affects Astur  1  Chance  100   

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

          and FatherTrait Cantabri >= 1
          and Trait BeingIberian >= 1

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Astur >= 1
          and Trait BeingIberian >= 1

          and Trait Astur < 1
          and Trait Cantabri < 1
          and Trait Lusitanians < 1
          and Trait Vascones < 1
          and Trait Turdetani < 1
          and Trait Indigetes < 1

          and Trait Contestani < 1

          and Trait Respected_Tribe4 < 1

    Affects Astur  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;---Scythian Tribes Trigger----------------
;------------------------------------------
        
;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Tauri
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad
          and FatherTrait Tauri >= 1
          and Trait BeingScythian >= 1

    Affects Tauri  1  Chance  100  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Maeotae
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad
          and FatherTrait Maeotae >= 1
          and Trait BeingScythian >= 1

    Affects Maeotae  1  Chance  100  

;------------------------------------------

Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Tauri
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Pantikapaion = scythia

    Affects Tauri  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Tauri
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Pantikapaion = scythia

    Affects Tauri  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType scythia
          and Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Uspe = scythia

    Affects Legae  1  Chance  15

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Royal_Scythian
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait Tauri < 1
          and Trait Maeotae < 1
          and Trait Massagetae < 1
          and Trait Sakae < 1
          and Trait Budini < 1
          and Trait Legae < 1
          and Trait Tissagetae < 1
          and Trait Royal_Scythian < 1
          and Trait Inconsequential_Tribe5 < 1
          and Trait Respected_Tribe5 < 1

    Affects Royal_Scythian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Royal_Scythian
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait Tauri < 1
          and Trait Maeotae < 1
          and Trait Massagetae < 1
          and Trait Sakae < 1
          and Trait Budini < 1
          and Trait Legae < 1
          and Trait Tissagetae < 1
          and Trait Royal_Scythian < 1
          and Trait Inconsequential_Tribe5 < 1
          and Trait Respected_Tribe5 < 1

    Affects Royal_Scythian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition Trait BeingScythian >= 1
          and CultureType nomad
          and Trait Tauri < 1
          and Trait Maeotae < 1

          and Trait Respected_Tribe5 < 1

    Affects Royal_Scythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Lycian
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingAnatolian >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Halikarnassos = pontus

    Affects Lycian  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType pontus
          and Trait BeingAnatolian >= 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Halikarnassos = pontus

    Affects Lycian  1  Chance  5

Trigger Anatolian_Subtribe_Safety1
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingAnatolian >= 1
          and FactionType pontus
          and Trait Lydian < 1
          and Trait Pamphylian < 1
          and Trait Cilician < 1
          and Trait Carian < 1
          and Trait Cappadocian < 1
          and Trait Phrygian < 1
          and Trait Paphlagonian < 1
          and Trait Mysian < 1
          and Trait Troes < 1
          and Trait Bithynian < 1
          and Trait Lycian < 1
          and Trait Pisidian < 1
          and Trait Chalybian < 1
          and Trait Inconsequential_Anatolian < 1
          and Trait Respected_Anatolian < 1

    Affects Cappadocian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition Trait BeingAnatolian >= 1
          and FactionType pontus
          and Trait Lydian < 1
          and Trait Pamphylian < 1
          and Trait Cilician < 1
          and Trait Carian < 1
          and Trait Cappadocian < 1
          and Trait Phrygian < 1
          and Trait Paphlagonian < 1
          and Trait Mysian < 1

          and Trait Respected_Anatolian < 1

          and FactionType pontus
          and Trait Lydian < 1
          and Trait Pamphylian < 1

    Condition Trait BeingAnatolian >= 1
          and FactionType pontus
          and Trait Lydian < 1
          and Trait Pamphylian < 1
          and Trait Cilician < 1

;===============================================================
;== Section AE - Attrition&Supply Module                      ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
;---Esprit de Corps Trait------------------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Esprit_de_Corps_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and Trait EspritDeCorps < 3

    Affects EspritDeCorps  3  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Esprit_de_Corps_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds < 0.5
          and BattleOdds > 0.16
          and Trait EspritDeCorps < 3

    Affects EspritDeCorps  6  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Esprit_de_Corps_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps > 0
          and Trait EspritDeCorps < 3

    Affects EspritDeCorps  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Esprit_de_Corps_04
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and Trait AntiEspritDeCorps < 3

    Affects AntiEspritDeCorps  9  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Esprit_de_Corps_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait AntiEspritDeCorps > 0
          and Trait AntiEspritDeCorps < 3

    Affects AntiEspritDeCorps  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger NeutralMorale_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 0
          and Trait AntiEspritDeCorps = 0
          and Trait NeutralMorale = 0

    Affects NeutralMorale  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger NeutralMorale_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 0
          and Trait AntiEspritDeCorps = 0
          and Trait NeutralMorale = 0

    Affects NeutralMorale  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HighEsteem_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 1
          and Trait HighEsteem = 0

    Affects HighEsteem  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HighEsteem_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 1
          and Trait HighEsteem = 0

    Affects HighEsteem  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Proud_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 2
          and Trait Proud = 0

    Affects Proud  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Proud_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 2
          and Trait Proud = 0

    Affects Proud  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 3
          and Trait Invincible = 0

    Affects Invincible  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait EspritDeCorps = 3
          and Trait Invincible = 0

    Affects Invincible  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not InEnemyLands
          and Trait FriendlyTerritory = 0

    Affects FriendlyTerritory  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not InEnemyLands
          and Trait FriendlyTerritory = 0

    Condition IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait EnemyTerritory = 0

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  100

    Condition IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait EnemyTerritory = 0

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  100

    Condition IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait EnemyTerritory = 0

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Enemy_Territory_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait Negotiation = 0
          and Trait EnemyTerritory > 0
          and Trait EnemyTerritory < 6

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  90 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Enemy_Territory_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait Negotiation = 1
          and Trait EnemyTerritory > 0
          and Trait EnemyTerritory < 6

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Enemy_Territory_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait Negotiation = 2
          and Trait EnemyTerritory > 0
          and Trait EnemyTerritory < 6

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Enemy_Territory_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait Negotiation = 3
          and Trait EnemyTerritory > 0
          and Trait EnemyTerritory < 6

    Affects EnemyTerritory  1  Chance  25
